tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Good Intentions
programme.desc: Mac defends a petty officer and former alcoholic accused of a brutal murder after a drinking binge which renders him useless in remembering details that could help him. Roberts is entangled in the case of a Navy Commander accused of embezzling funds.(n)

programme.title: JAG: People vs SECNAV
programme.desc: After an incident in Iraq claims the lives of innocent civilians, SecNav is brought up on charges of war crimes in International Court, and Harm and Mac must defend him. Meanwhile, during a trip to the arcade, little A.J. goes missing.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Coming Home
programme.desc: A marine’s killing in Iraq has ramifications for JAG stateside as Harm helps the soldier’s family with a media onslaught, and Bud and Mac investigate the failure of his flack vest.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Fighting Words
programme.desc: A general’s comments about Islam during a church service pit Harm and Mac against each other as a court-martial hearing examines whether those remarks were a danger to national security.(n)

programme.title: JAG: One Big Boat
programme.desc: When a Naval Academy sailing team gets caught in a squall and a team member drowns, Mac and Turner must determine if their driven commander willingly put his crew at risk.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Cuba Libre
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Cuba when a woman from Cabe's past pleads for him to help catch a Serbian war criminal.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Fish Filet
programme.desc: In order to save the lives of three judges, Sylvester goes undercover in federal prison but Team Scorpion must break him out when his life is threatened. Kevin Weisman guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Robots
programme.desc: Walter, Cabe, and Happy are trapped with the crew in a top-secret submarine when an explosion sends it to the bottom of the ocean with limited oxygen.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Super Fun Guys
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on the "Super Fun Guy" movie set in Kazakstan in order to disable a Soviet-era nuclear missile being sold by terrorists.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Tech, Drugs, and Rock 'n Roll
programme.desc: Walter's attempt to "normalize" goes horribly wrong when a nefarious virus is uploaded to his computer.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: SECRET LOCATION PT2
programme.desc: Most Haunted's deadliest investigation, Part 2. Spirits emerging, team's resolve tested as darkness envelops. Growing fear, team's safety at stake. Can they continue?(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 1
programme.desc: This time Yvette and her team ventures into the dark abyss of the cellars under this large\ncountry house. Without exception every member of the team experience something\nunexplained as the darkness starts to come to life.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Moat House Part 2
programme.desc: Yvette heads to Tamworth and a beautiful manor house that is said to be filled with\nparanormal occurrences. Almost as soon as the team get there something seems to want to\nmake itself known with dramatic effect.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette starts the new series with an investigation at the haunted Eden Camp. Strange noises and an unknown force try to separate the team. Can they endure the entire investigation, or will the paranormal activity prove too much for them to handle?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Tunnels of Terror
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lockport, New York to investigate an underworld of tunnels. It holds a mystery of possible murder, multiple deaths and frightening phenomena. What stories do the spirits of Lockport Caves want to tell?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 5
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fortress of Phantoms
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads tothe historic Fort Adams in Newport, Rhode Island. The teams investigate three deadly eventsthat surprisingly weren't from battle!(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Permanent Residents
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Cortland, New York to investigate The 1890 House.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Something in the Water
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Excelsior Springs, Missouri to investigate The Elms Resort & Spa.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Barrels of Boos
programme.desc: For Season 10's premiere episode, TAPS is heading back out on the American Whiskey Trail to investigate the Wild Turkey Distillery in Kentucky. It's believed that the spirits of founding family members are behind the activity there!(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Rhade find a test that will either grant them great wealth or drive them to madness.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper discovers a program that can destroy eight of the Seefra planets, killing millions.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: While Harper works on a way to save the Seefra system, a spy sneaks aboard Andromeda and attacks Beka.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Saving Light From a Black Sun
programme.desc: An attempt is made to fix the blinking sun of Seefra, but Trance is replaced by a doppelganger.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When Dylan is badly injured in a lab explosion, he travels through a series of alternate realities.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rommie is rebuilt to help evacuate the Seefra system.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.6
programme.desc: Teen catfight leads to adult feud over truck vandalism/Teen crashes car after drunk 17-year-old allegedly permits him, sued by her father.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.203
programme.desc: A Malibu man claiming he was tired of being a “cabana boy” for his older girlfriend is sued for allegedly stealing her tools and making unauthorized charges on her credit card.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.236
programme.desc: Ex-fiancés from rehab fight publicly and clash in court over an arrest, property return, and a dog. A 19-year-old sues her mother for spending a dog bite settlement check.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.235
programme.desc: A woman sues her sister's ex for repossessing a Chevy Yukon; he alleges stolen tags. Exes argue over a bite mark and sue for car damages, a lease, and unpaid vet bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.82
programme.desc: Two sisters sue a family member for allegedly selling their third\t\t\t\r\nsister’s belongings at a garage sale while she was incarcerated/An allegedly unpaid loan for breast augmentation further divides a woman and her estranged daughter-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.211
programme.desc: Convicted of first-degree assault after an altercation at a bar, a man is sued by his ex-girlfriend who bailed him out of jail.\t\t\t\r\nAn alleged assault between former college dorm mates, a cycle of harassment, and a damaged computer are disputed.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.188
programme.desc: A troubled teen is at the center of a dispute between a woman and her son-in-law’s daughter over the cost of two airplane tickets to Pittsburgh.\t\t\t\r\nA woman sues her son-in-law’s granddaughter for money loaned to buy a mobile home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.246
programme.desc: Racial slurs and violent threats emerge as a woman and her father sue a family member for incomplete home renovations. Meanwhile, friends swap cell phones, but a defective device complicates the arrangement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.197
programme.desc: Woman sues child's father for PlayStation III balance and harassment. 'Good Samaritan' sues former friend for student loan balance.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.133
programme.desc: Woman sues ex-friend for damaging Pontiac Grand Prix she was selling; ex-friend countersues for car payments. Parents fight over sick child's medication; neighbor testifies helping administer meds.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.49
programme.desc: A teenager is accused of spitting in the face of and taunting another teenager; an angry mother sues after allegedly false charges of assault and battery are filed against her son.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.254
programme.desc: A teenager sues her sister for a loan to pay car insurance and credit card charges. A man demands payment for an Oldsmobile Alero repossessed by his ex-girlfriend. Another teen sues an ex-friend for assault during an argument over missing property.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining contestants visit BLT Steak, where the winner will be working. Back at Hell's Kitchen, the team which produces the best food receives a trip to Venice Beach, while the losers have to go back to the kitchen to perform prep work.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must cook three dishes each requiring a progressively shorter amount of time with the prize being a shopping trip.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: For the first time in Hell's Kitchen history, chefs from prior seasons return to compete with the remaining competitors.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each chef must create something special from Alaskan salmon, the winner gets a helicopter ride and lunch at LA's Water Grill, while the losers prep fish for the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants are challenged to recreate a dish they have tasted and the winner receives tickets to a baseball game. At evening service, each contestant takes charge of the kitchen and must deal with deliberate sabotage from Chef Ramsay.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: In the final of the US cooking competition the last two contestants take part in a challenge which is judged by executives from BLT Steak.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Canlan Ice Sports Corp is the largest private owner of sports facilities in North America. CEO Joey St Aubin admits their prices are higher than local municipal rinks, but believes his company offers a premium service and better ice quality.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Pimp My Bride
programme.desc: Russell reluctantly agrees to host a photo shoot in his apartment for Audrey's magazine, with the hope of landing a date with a hot model. Adam steps in to play the groom in Audrey's wedding-themed shoot.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff’s New Friend
programme.desc: Jeff is surprised when Audrey informs him that the new friend he made at the gym is gay. Meanwhile, Russell worries the young woman he's dating might be his daughter.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Voluntary Commitment
programme.desc: After a long line of female assistants, Russell learns that having a male assistant can be very advantageous. Meanwhile, after volunteering to read to the elderly, Audrey makes a bet with Jeff that she can commit to finishing a project.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Dad's Visit
programme.desc: Much to Audrey's dismay, Jeff's chauvinist father, who expects Audrey to wait on him hand and foot, extends his visit after spraining his ankle. Meanwhile, Russell has a one-night stand with a woman who won't leave his apartment.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: May Divorce Be With You
programme.desc: When Audrey invites her and Jeff's recently divorced out of luck friend Steve to stay with them for a few days, Audrey thinks she may have become Steve's newest rebound.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Brother
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk hold the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mid-Course Correction
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby's Back in Town
programme.desc: Dog tries to nab a fugitive, named Wayne, by calling and telling him that he's won a new vacuum cleaner and he should stick around to get it. Dog then sends his daughter, Lyssa, to "deliver" the vacuum cleaner and lure Wayne out of his house.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise! Surprise!
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Ice in Paradise
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fathers in Law
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Men vs. Wild
programme.desc: Brotherly competition is taken to a whole new level when Jase and Willie challenge Alan and Jep to a survival race through the woods on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Si is interested in finding a new hobby when he sees Kay cutting coupons.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.(n)

programme.title: Queen of Outer Space
programme.desc: American astronauts are drawn by a mysterious force to the planet Venus, which they find to be inhabited only by beautiful women and their despotic queen.(n)

programme.title: Robot Apocalypse
programme.desc: When expert hacker Tara tries to stop a powerful, sentient A.I. as it takes over the world's military, the A.I. marks her as a terrorist.(n)

programme.title: Above the Shadows
programme.desc: Starring Olivia Thirlby, Alan Ritchson, Jim Gaffigan, Maria Dizzia, Tito Ortiz, David Johansen, and Megan Fox following an invisible woman who must find her way back with the help of the one man who can see her.(n)

programme.title: Replicas
programme.desc: A scientist becomes obsessed with bringing back his family members who died in a traffic accident.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: A dramatization of the April 2010 disaster, when an oil well called Deepwater Horizon exploded causing the worst spill in US history.(n)

programme.title: The Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: Two highly skilled martial arts warriors must train an American teen so that he is able to fight a centuries old battle to free the Monkey King.(n)

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Set in 1968, a German Shepherd enrolled by his family in a training program that will send him to serve American soldiers in Vietnam. Even when Rain is wounded, he saves many, and bonds with a soldier who learns much from this very special dog.(n)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: When Nathan (Taylor Lautner) discovers the parents who raised him aren't his real folks, he begins to uncover unsettling secrets that trigger events and leave him running for his life.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.sub-title: And The Lost Treasure of Ugarit
programme.desc: Young archaeologist Jack Hunter refuses to join his mentor, Professor Shaffer, who believes a poem is a coded treasure map, on a relic hunt, until his friend is murdered to steal it. The suspect is a Syrian artifact trader so he flies to Damascas.(n)

programme.title: Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: Starring Matthew Knight and Chris Kattan. Three children and their father move from California to Canada. When they go shopping at the mall, they find counterfeit cash, inadvertently help catch crooks, and make a discovery about Santa.(n)

programme.title: A Gift Wrapped Christmas
programme.desc: Starring Meredith Hagner, Travis Milne, and Beverley Mitchell. Personal shopper Gwen's new client is a workaholic single father. When Gwen meets his 7-year-old son, she makes their lacking father-son relationship her Christmas mission.(n)

programme.title: A Very Corgi Christmas
programme.desc: Laura, a single mom meets a fellow single dad Ben, who enlists her help in taking care of a cute corgi puppy he plans to give to his daughter at Christmas. Through all the chaos, Lauren gets the chance to finally experience the holiday spirit.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.sub-title: Mary Higgins Clark: All Around The Town
programme.desc: An innocent girl is kidnapped and held hostage for two years causing her to develop multiple personalities and making her the number one suspect when her English professor is brutally murdered.(n)

programme.title: Mary Higgins Clark
programme.desc: Having the winning lottery jackpot ticket is the best thing that could have happened to delivery man Bill Regan. Determined to find out what happened, a friend retraces Bill's delivery stops and discovers they lead to her own husband.(n)

programme.title: My Family's Secret
programme.desc: Starring Nicholle Tom and Dylan Neal. When Lara starts to investigate the attempted suicide of her husband and sister-in-law, she is led to his mentally ill brother, Grady - and finds herself in grave danger.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Beauty
programme.desc: A pretty, successful masseuse and spa owner pays the price for being a good Samaritan when the young woman she helps turns out to be a ruthless killer.(n)

programme.title: A Royal Night Out
programme.desc: As Europe celebrates V-E Day in 1945, teenage princesses Elizabeth II (Sarah Gadon) and Margaret (Bel Powley) spend a wild evening in London.(n)

programme.title: The Prince and Me
programme.desc: A premedical student (Julia Stiles) falls in love with a Danish prince (Luke Mably) who keeps his identity a secret.(n)

programme.title: Love, Rosie
programme.desc: Rosie and Alex are best friends until Alex's family moves to America. They gamble everything to keep their love and friendship alive over the years and miles.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A boy's mother dies and father is in prison, the Cartwrights step in to look after the boy until the uncle comes to claim him.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: A former dance hall girl poses as a Spanish heiress to claim a land grant, the Cartwrights try to fight the claim.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Bonanza Series
programme.desc: The adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their ranch while helping the surrounding community.(n)

programme.title: Time Toys
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble upon a chest full of toys from the future. The discovery takes them on an adventure using their new-found toys to save their neighbourhood and the world from a maniacal madman. A fun, futuristic adventure for all the family.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 1
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: Witches of Oz: Episode 2
programme.desc: Dorothy Gale writes children's books based on the Land of Oz created by her grandfather. Her life turns upside down when she learns that Oz is real and she must stop the Wicked Witch.(n)

programme.title: You Stupid Man
programme.desc: A writer struggles to deal with the break-up with his girlfriend. It does not help with getting her out of his mind that she recently became a famous TV start.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Funny Money
programme.desc: When Henry Perkins accidentally trades his briefcase with a man, he finds five million dollars inside. However, the cash draws in Mr. Big, who wants to reclaim his money.(n)

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A baby sitter is terrorised by a homicidal maniac who's escaped from a mental institution to kill his ex-wife.(n)

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A history of inherited insanity spells trouble for a 19th-century nobleman suspected of a series of grisly murders.(n)

programme.title: Straight on Till Morning
programme.desc: A timid, withdrawn woman from Liverpool moves to London and finally meets a man who she believes to be the love of her life, but unbeknownst to her, that man is a vicious serial killer.(n)

programme.title: Find The Lady
programme.desc: During New Year's Eve, a young model spends the day searching for her grandmother, who has suspiciously gone missing.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) experiences the anguishing aftermath of rape after he leaps into the life of the victim (Cheryl Pollak), and it intensifies when he takes the accused rapist (Matthew Sheehan) to court.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) descends into a lower life form as he leaps into the body of a chimpanzee that is part of an interspecies communication experiment and a candidate for space travel. Caroline Goodall guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: While in the body of a police officer, Sam (Scott Bakula) needs help from a psychiatrist to interpret the nightmares he begins having. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.sub-title: A Single Drop of Rain - September 7, 1953
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the center of attention as a rainmaker arriving in the parched town of Clover Bend, Texas, promising precipitation to drought-weary farmers. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a member of a 1956 chain gang, where he is shackled to an innocent American Indian (Basil Wallace) who is determined to escape. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Memories of Montmartre
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel head to Paris, France to find a stolen locket, so they can clear Sydney's dead grandmother of the charges.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Put Back
programme.desc: Kuba, Africa 100 AD: Worshippers of Woote curse his idol to protect it. 2000: Ross Crawford comes to Sydney, because he took the idol and the curse has accelerated his aging.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Legend of the Lost
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel set out to find if the legend of the lost civilization in New Guinea is actually true. Unfortunately, they have to team up with Derek Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Dagger of Death
programme.desc: India, 500 A.D.: A precious dagger is used in human sacrifices to goddess Kali. Sydney must return a relic to India for her fellow hunter, who believes the dagger made him kill his assistant.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Last of the Mochicas
programme.desc: On a search for a South American Mochica Indian relic of protection, Nigel and his colleagues get captured by local guerrillas. It's up to Sydney and ally Jason Clark to save them.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Auction Hunters, Ink.
programme.desc: Autographed 1960s Bob Shaw Swing Gate tattoo machine; Terry Ives competition 22hp chainsaw; six foot chainsaw-carved cedar bear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Easy Money
programme.desc: Allen & Ton head to New Orleans in search of easy money, but instead encounter some bayou bidders with big-time bucks! They discover a pair of early 19th-century dueling pistols & a vintage airboat fitted with a turbine engine!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Smoking Ton
programme.desc: WW2 Stuart M3 tank barrel and heavy duty tank treads; rare, collectors' 1890 silver inlayed humidor; high-end industrial meat slicer in the ultimate restaurant unit.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)
